channel.description: Our first attempt at semi-regular blog posts.

item.title: Website Update using Quarto
item.dc:creator: Christian Frankenberg
item.description:
Why a new website

When I first started my faculty job, I created my own website but coded most of the tools myself, which looked fun but was incredibly hard to maintain. Unsurprisingly, I hadnâ€™t changed my website for more than 3 years and eveything became outdated. My group members, esp. Yiwei Mao, Yinon Bar-On and Alexis Renchon showed me new tools and suggested to use Quarto. Lots of nice examples from Affcom Lab , Crump Lab , and Gilmore Lab were used.
